version_description:
1) Add more 9 languages to localization.
2) Optimize the program to enhance the stability of the program.
3) Fix the bug.

1) Add more 9 languages to localization.
2) Optimize the program to enhance the stability of the program.
3) Fix the bug.

1) Fix the loading project, there is no problem starting the playback, the export file may be incorrect.
2) Fix the problem that the sound quality of the exported file is damaged after adding the variable speed sound.
3) Optimize the program to fix some problems with the program crash.

1) Fix the loading project, there is no problem starting the playback, the export file may be incorrect.
2) Fix the problem that the sound quality of the exported file is damaged after adding the variable speed sound.
3) Optimize the program to fix some problems with the program crash.

1) Fix the problem that the file may be too short after editing the audio, and the program may crash.
2) Fix the problem of noise reduction in 1.0.7.

1) Fix the problem that the file may be too short after editing the audio, and the program may crash.
2) Fix the problem of noise reduction in 1.0.7.

1) Add the multi-select delete share function.
2) Optimize the program to enhance the stability of the program.

1) Add the multi-select delete share function.
2) Optimize the program to enhance the stability of the program.

1) Add a clip auto save mechanism.
2) Add the adjustment range to select the volume line function.
3) Add clip sharing and clip import function, you can share the unfinished clips to other devices to continue editing.
4) Optimize the program experience.

1) Add a clip auto save mechanism.
2) Add the adjustment range to select the volume line function.
3) Add clip sharing and clip import function, you can share the unfinished clips to other devices to continue editing.
4) Optimize the program experience.
1) Optimize localized prompt text.
1) Optimize localized prompt text.

1) Add the accompaniment extraction function, no longer afraid to find the accompaniment (center channel extraction function).
2) Optimize the delay of multitrack audio alignment.
3) Optimize the program to enhance stability.

1) Add the accompaniment extraction function, no longer afraid to find the accompaniment (center channel extraction function).
2) Optimize the delay of multitrack audio alignment.
3) Optimize the program to enhance stability.

1) Fix the problem of opening the iTunes library and opening the file for the second time.
2) Optimize the program experience.
3) Add watch the rewarded video to experience advanced feature for free.

1) Fix the problem of opening the iTunes library and opening the file for the second time.
2) Optimize the program experience.

Fix the problem that the iTunes library could not be displayed for the first time.
Fix the problem that the iTunes library could not be displayed for the first time.

1) Optimize the program experience.
2) Fix the problem of sometimes no sound when exporting audio from a device with lower performance.

1) Optimize the program experience.
2) Fix the problem of sometimes no sound when exporting audio from a device with lower performance.

1) Add hidden/display audio location information options.
2) Optimize the performance of the program.

1) Add hidden/display audio location information options.
2) Optimize the performance of the program.

1) Adapt to iOS 13 dark mode.
2) Add external keyboard shortcuts to edit audio faster.
3) Fix bugs and optimize the experience.

1) Adapt to iOS 13 dark mode.
2) Add external keyboard shortcuts to edit audio faster.
3) Fix bugs and optimize the experience.

1) Add the function of clearing the cache file.
2) Increase the display track number information.
3) Optimize the experience of the program and fix bugs.
4) Add translations in Portuguese.

1) Add the function of clearing the cache file.
2) Increase the display track number information.
3) Optimize the experience of the program and fix bugs.
4) Add translations in Portuguese.

1. Improve the audio quality of the clip and increase the output rate of the ultra high code.
2. Optimize the program experience.

1. Improve the audio quality of the clip and increase the output rate of the ultra high code.
2. Optimize the program experience.

1) Increase the export file priority setting to ensure the export quality of low-performance devices.
2) Increase the click time to move the magnetic head line by 10 milliseconds, and adapt the keyboard shortcut keys for external keyboard control.
3) After importing audio files such as FLAC, the file type is displayed incorrectly.
4) Fix known issues.

1) Increase the export file priority setting to ensure the export quality of low-performance devices.
2) Increase the click time to move the magnetic head line by 10 milliseconds, and adapt the keyboard shortcut keys for external keyboard control.
3) After importing audio files such as FLAC, the file type is displayed incorrectly.
4) Fix known issues.

1) Fixed the problem that the file may be muted after the center channel is extracted and noise reduction occurs.
2) Fix some known issues.

1) Fixed the problem that the file may be muted after the center channel is extracted and noise reduction occurs.
2) Fix some known issues.

1) Add 3 times a day to watch ads and export audio files of unlimited length.
2) Optimize the software UI.

2) Optimize the software UI.

1) Add the copy function of clip items.
2) Fixed the problem that the iTunes library cannot be imported directly after searching the iTunes library.
3) Optimization procedures.

2) Fixed the problem that the iTunes library cannot be imported directly after searching the iTunes library.
3) Optimization procedures.

1) Add the option of exporting ultra-low sound quality.
2) Fix the problem that sometimes it cannot be imported.
3) Fix known bugs.

1) Add the option of exporting ultra-low sound quality.
2) Fix the problem that sometimes it cannot be imported.
3) Fix known bugs.

1) Increase the adaption to the iPadOS Magic Keyboard.
2) Optimize the editing operation, you can reset the selection range by dragging on the timeline. You can directly drag on the single-track mode waveform to modify the selection range.
3) Add keyboard shortcuts to delete, delete activated audio and selection range.
4) Replace UIWebView to display help document for WKWebView.
5) Optimize some operations to improve user experience.
6) Fix known bugs.
